description: Creating Cloud Technology Co., Ltd. (founded in 2011) specializes in cloud management and cyber security technologies. We hold multiple security certifications including ISO 27001:2022. Through our proprietary 'WinNexus' platform, we help enterprises optimize software resources and improve IT management efficiency. We also build stable technical foundations in cloud and AI native service areas.

WinNexus provides lightweight ITSM, asset lifecycle management, software distribution, and IT process automation. It supports software license cost reduction and integration with AD/LDAP/SSO. Furthermore, it strengthens security features such as external device control, user behavior logs, and VANS/GCB modules. It has been deployed in over 50 mid-to-large enterprises and government agencies, managing over 1 million endpoints.

features.title: Scan
features.description: Scans terminal PC software usage including installed software, versions, usage time, and frequency.

features.title: Report
features.description: Real-time delivery reporting to accurately track results for each PC and analyze failure causes.

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Integrates with AD for login control. Can also operate independently without AD.

features.title: Silent Execution
features.description: Performs updates and hotfix installs quietly without interrupting user work.

features.title: Effect
features.description: Optimizes license management to purchase only what is needed, reducing waste and shortages.

features.title: Report
features.description: Real-time delivery reporting to accurately track results for each PC and analyze failure causes.

features.title: Update Management
features.description: Improves time-consuming update tasks and records history. Automated deployment reduces admin workload.

features.title: Comparison
features.description: Intelligent comparison identifies software vulnerabilities based on latest support center standards, allowing preemptive reinforcement.

features.title: Record Management
features.description: Micro-manages software changes including install, uninstall, and version history.

features.title: One-Click Complete & Restore
features.description: Complete GCB scan, apply, and verify in one click. 'One-Click Restore' allows reverting to original config if issues arise.

features.title: Visual Charts
features.description: Automatically integrates GCB data into intelligent charts for at-a-glance status monitoring.

features.title: Report Correction
features.description: Detailed reporting of delivery results with statistics and failure analysis for rapid correction.

features.title: One-Stop Management
features.description: Manages OS, browser, application, and network device firewall GCB settings in one place.

features.title: Real-time Detection
features.description: Monitors abnormal behavior instantly, giving no room for attackers.

features.title: Intelligent Response
features.description: Aggregates global security intelligence to support accurate decision making.

features.title: File Recording
features.description: Records all file hash changes to eliminate malware tampering possibilities.

features.title: One-Click Install
features.description: Install and uninstall in one click, significantly reducing time and labor costs.

features.title: Email Alerts
features.description: Automatically sends warning emails to designated addresses upon security incidents.

features.title: 802.1X Auth
features.description: Manage and control network via 802.1X standard without additional hardware.

features.title: Device Blocking
features.description: Manually allow or block devices from the management console. Easily handle special requirements or anomalies.

features.title: Network Isolation
features.description: Authenticated users are assigned to distinct VLANs based on permissions, isolating visitors from critical equipment.

features.title: Network Topology
features.description: Visual topology map records and displays the status of all devices in the network.

features.title: Device Collection & Detection
features.description: Automatically collects network card info for all online devices and detects Agent installation status.

features.title: Manufacturer Matching
features.description: Rapidly matches device manufacturers and registration countries to check for specific equipment (e.g. from China).

features.title: Detection Alerts
features.description: Customizable alerts based on country or other criteria with real-time email warnings.

features.title: Access Control Check
features.description: Regularly checks IoT device status to detect and warn about faulty access control systems or cameras.

features.title: USB & File Management
features.description: Strict USB access control based on compliance. Detailed recording of operations and file changes.

features.title: Screen Watermark
features.description: Customizable desktop watermarks to prevent information leakage via photography.

features.title: Encryption & Steganography
features.description: Files are encrypted immediately upon closing. Steganography hides the existence of sensitive files.

features.title: Document & Screenshot Protection
features.description: Restricts clipboard and screenshot functions when sensitive files are open.

features.title: Core Architecture
features.description: Based on NIST SP 800-207. Implements dynamic authentication and authorization for every access.

features.title: Dynamic Trust
features.description: Dynamically adjusts permissions based on user and device real-time status. Enforces least privilege.

features.title: On-Prem Gateway
features.description: Proprietary on-prem gateway mechanism for precise control of internal critical nodes.

features.title: Seamless Integration
features.description: Integrates seamlessly with NAC, VANS, and DLP modules. Aligns with CISA Zero Trust Maturity Model.

features.title: One-Stop Management
features.description: Centralized management of network traffic and resource allocation via WinNexus.

features.title: Data Protection & SD-WAN
features.description: Combines ZTNA, SD-WAN, SWG, FWaaS, and DLP for cost-effective, high-security data protection.

features.title: Secure Remote Access
features.description: Ensures secure access for remote workers with connection reservation features.
